casebody.data:
No. 09-1527. John S. Karls, Petitioner v. The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., et al.; John S. Karls, Petitioner v. Citigroup of North America, Inc., et al.; and John S. Karls, Petitioner v. ING Financial Holdings Corporation, et al. 562 U.S. 838, 131 S. Ct. 180,

178 L. Ed. 2d 42,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5884. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
